item.title: Statement on COVID-19 and additional resources
item.description: **_ _**Check back here for up to date information. June 19, 2020 Update on COVID-19 As the state begins to allow businesses to reopen we urge you to make responsible decisions about what is in the best interest of your community and you personally. If your business is reopening the State of Michigan requires that you update your COVID-19 Preparedness & Response Plan. Next Tuesday there is a hands on workshop on creating this plan available here: LINK
